name: Confirm area of work is accessible & acceptable to commence (If not comment below)
Setout & alignment as per drawing (include revision below)
Cold water and hot water installed as per AS3500 and tested to 15 00Kpa. (Twice)
Gas installed as per AS3500 and tested
Suspended pipework is supported as per as 3500
Fire collars installed, sealed and smoke sealed . (Fill in unused penetrations)
Basin wastes and noggins installed to correct height
In wall cisterns installed to correct height. (if required)
